projectGridLines.stationName: AquaCarta ( partnered by Waterlife India ) - Aerial Imagery
projectGridLines.title: Water Mapping and Intelligence
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Aerial Mapping of water using HPI/ Lidar/ Radar/ Drones etc

Skill sets: Use of satellite imagery, drones, mapping tools, data analytics,  

Traits expectation: Entrepreneurial, positive, high energy, willing to learn 

Expected learning: Aerial imagery, water mapping and sustainability, Analytics

Specific courses required for project execution:  CS/ Satellites / Analytics
